TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OlExchangeConnectionMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica se a conta está conectada a um servidor do Exchange e, caso esteja, o modo de conexão.

span.span: Specifies whether the account is connected to an Exchange server and if so, the connection mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olCachedConnectedDrizzle = int32(600)

summary.span: A conta está usando o modo cache do Exchange de forma que os cabeçalhos são baixados primeiro, seguidos por corpos e anexos de itens completos.

span.span: The account is using cached Exchange mode such that headers are downloaded first, followed by the bodies and attachments of full items.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olCachedConnectedFull = int32(700)

summary.span: A conta está usando o modo cache do Exchange em uma Rede de Área Local ou uma conexão rápida com o servidor Exchange. O usuário também pode selecionar esse estado manualmente, desabilitando a lógica de autodetecção e sempre baixando itens completos independentemente da velocidade da conexão.

span.span: The account is using cached Exchange mode on a Local Area Network or a fast connection with the Exchange server. The user can also select this state manually, disabling auto-detect logic and always downloading full items regardless of connection speed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olCachedConnectedHeaders = int32(500)

summary.span: A conta está usando o modo cache do Exchange em uma conexão discada ou lenta com o servidor Exchange, de forma que somente cabeçalhos são baixados. Corpos de itens completos e anexos permanecem no servidor. O usuário também pode selecionar esse estado manualmente independentemente da velocidade da conexão.

span.span: The account is using cached Exchange mode on a dial-up or slow connection with the Exchange server, such that only headers are downloaded. Full item bodies and attachments remain on the server. The user can also select this state manually regardless of connection speed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olCachedDisconnected = int32(400)

summary.span: A conta está usando o modo cache do Exchange com uma conexão desconectada com o servidor Exchange.

span.span: The account is using cached Exchange mode with a disconnected connection to the Exchange server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olCachedOffline = int32(200)

summary.span: A conta está usando o modo cache do Exchange e o usuário selecionou Trabalhar Offline no menu arquivo.

span.span: The account is using cached Exchange mode and the user has selected Work Offline from the File menu.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olDisconnected = int32(300)

summary.span: A conta possui uma conexão desconectada ao servidor Exchange.

span.span: The account has a disconnected connection to the Exchange server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olNoExchange = int32(0)

summary.span: A conta não usa um servidor Exchange.

span.span: The account does not use an Exchange server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olOffline = int32(100)

summary.span: A conta não está conectada a um servidor Exchange e está no modo offline clássico.

span.span: The account is not connected to an Exchange server and is in the classic offline mode.

summary.span: Isso também ocorre quando o usuário seleciona Trabalhar Offline no menu arquivo.

span.span: This also occurs when the user selects Work Offline from the File menu.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlExchangeConnectionMode olOnline = int32(800)

summary.span: A conta está conectada a um servidor Exchange e está no modo online clássico.

span.span: The account is connected to an Exchange server and is in the classic online mode.
